sentences.sContent: She has a teenage daughter from a previous marriage.
sentences.sCn: 她有个出自前一次婚姻的十几岁的女儿。

sentences.sContent: ...James Burke of Duke University is one of the authors of a study reviewing previous research on cognitive decline...
...Some previous studies have suggested that challenging your brain with mentally stimulating activities might help...
...It pays laid-off workers up to half of their previous wages while they look for work...
...for example--an increase of just one percent from the previous year despite a year of high-profile launches...
...he came away puzzled: why was it considered so superior to the three other Leonardos in the previous chamber...
...and anticipations cited above have failed so miserably because their authors and promoters thought the transitions they hoped to implement would proceed unlike all previous energy transitions...
...ladies and gentlemen! As instructed in our previous meeting...
...They are not bound - as were previous generations of humans - by what they were taught...
...So I think where maybe after other recessions they might return to previous spending habits...
...The number of new auto loans was up by l6% in the second quarter compared with the previous year...
...there is the risk that the rising generation will be less well educated than the previous one...
...that almost all of the books published in the 20th century are still under copyright – and the last century saw more books published than in all previous centuries combined...
...so they can still hold on to the previous stereotypes...
...Are cities and towns less safe and kids more vulnerable to crimes like child kidnap and sexual abuse than they were in previous generations...
...or is the world a more complicated and dangerous place than it was when previous generations were allowed to wander about unsupervised...
...Then there’s the whole question of whether modern parents are more watchful and nervous about safety than previous generations...
...What was the woman’s previous job...
...fit in as previous generations did...
...they worked out that people who had quit in the previous decade were much more likely to be overweight than smokers and people who had never smoked...

phrases.pCn: 上一页，前一页；返回上一级菜单
（国会议事程序中作为动议提出的）先决问题

remMethod.val: pre(预先， …前) ＋ vi(路) ＋ ous(…的) → 先的， 前的

trans.tranCn: 先的， 前的， 以前的
trans.tranOther: A previous event or thing is one that happened or existed before the one that you are talking about
